poster: x R e n g a R x
title: End of Season Rewards???
body:
Sooo I'm gonna cut to the chase. I got banned for 2 weeks my main. I have played about like 50 games on my account after the 2 week ban. I have not been toxic or even typing in chat anymore. I simple mute negative behavior and move on with my game. I believe I'm reformed. I dont take trolls to heart nor do I care if I lose. Life goes on as usual.

The question is...do I get season rewards if I keep up being a civil player now with no chat restrictions or bans?

Or is it still like last season where people who got bans or ranked restricted don't get rewards?

replies.body: I believe you still do. I don't think a 2 week ban is too severe. (Its the second warning I assume?)

> [{quoted}](name=Jin Air Flow,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=whzGE6y3,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-05-17T21:56:13.447+0000)
>
> I believe you still do. I don't think a 2 week ban is too severe. (Its the second warning I assume?)

2 week ban is your final warning.  The punishment tiers are as follows:

* 10 game chat restriction
* 25 game chat restriction
* 14 day ban
* permaban
Ah, The last time I got banned was in season 2, and that was the second warning :]. I guess it has changed.
